name: Hidden Facade
storyline:
John, a tortured father whose life is turned upside down by the sudden and tragic death of his daughter. Ana, a guilt-stricken mother driven mad by her role in her daughter’s accident. And Barbara, an innocent little girl gone too soon. But just what exactly happened?
A family torn apart by tragedy. Two parents begin to be haunted by strange visions and dreams of their daughter, Barbara. The lines between dream and reality begin to blur, turning life into a living nightmare. This horrifying sequence of events grows more and more sinister, as what is fact and what is fiction becomes more and more unclear. What really happened that day at the lake? The ghost of Barbara is the only voice who knows the truth, but are John and Ana listening?
Are you?
summary: Throughout the game, you can play as all 2 main characters, and they all have a story to tell, but don’t let your eyes and ears deceive you. 2 stories bleed together, and it’s up to you to make sense of this tragic tale before the game ends. Who you believe is up to you, but everybody’s got a secret.
